name: Watch your step (EdwardBonnett)
description:
A unique twist on a roguelike dungeon crawler, every step you take the floor crumbles away! See how many floors you can go down.

WASD / Arrow keys / ZQSD to move

Space to use sword to kill enemies, flick levers, push crates and smash pots.

Tips:

Crates can be pushed into holes to make a pathway.

There is a map in a chest on each level.
